name: nyc-homeschool-landing-page
description: NYC Homeschool Landing Page - Static HTML/CSS/JavaScript website

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:copy && npm run build:minify
scripts.build:copy: cp -r *.html css js assets dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:minify: npm run build:minify:css && npm run build:minify:js
scripts.build:minify:css: for file in dist/css/*.css; do [ -f "$file" ] && npx clean-css-cli -o "$file" "$file"; done
scripts.build:minify:js: for file in dist/js/*.js; do [ -f "$file" ] && npx terser "$file" -o "$file" --compress --mangle; done
